nodes.text: The Battle Group of Yun-Harla was one of the five battle groups that served within the Yuuzhan Vong warfleet under the command of Warmaster Tsavong Lah during the Battle of Ebaq 9.

When the Yuuzhan Vong arrived in the system, this Battle Group was kept in reserve along with the Battle Group of Yun-Yuuzhan, while the other three groups engaged the fleets of Admiral Traest Kre'fey and General Keyan Farlander. When the Smugglers' Alliance arrived, they were forced into the battle. However, the tide quickly turned against the Yuuzhan Vong; Lah, after discovering the nature of the trap, was forced to order his fleets to withdraw back to Yuuzhan Vong Space. However, the Yun-Harla group and the Yun-Txiin battle group were pulled out of hyperspace and severely damaged by the mines that the New Republic had laid out to further hamper any retreat. Both groups suffered extreme casualties both in terms of warships and personnel as a result of the battle and subsequent evacuation.
